CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-07-11 14:10
Subject: Maison Margiela UAE E-Commerce, One Chalhoub | First Impression, New Security Solution, New Episode of The Posdcast, Saks - The Designer Sale, Weekly Internal Opportunities
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

Maison Margiela Launches UAE 
E-Com

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1481&user=10620> 	

Maison Margiela has unveiled its official UAE E-commerce site <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1481&user=10620> , offering clients across the Emirates access to the full world of the Maison including ready-to-wear, accessories, footwear, fragrances, and icons like the Tabi and Replica.
With same-day delivery in Dubai, next-day service across the UAE, and flexible payment options.
Enjoy 25% off all full-priced items by registering with your Chalhoub Group email and using code Chalhoub Employee at checkout. 
(Excludes discounted items)

Maison Margiela has unveiled its official UAE E-commerce site <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1481&user=10620> , offering clients across the Emirates access to the full world of the Maison including ready-to-wear, accessories, footwear, fragrances, and icons like the Tabi and Replica.
With same-day delivery in Dubai, next-day service across the UAE, and flexible payment options.
Enjoy 25% off all full-priced items by registering with your Chalhoub Group email and using code Chalhoub Employee at checkout. 
(Excludes discounted items)

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-7-min.png> 	

A new Episode of The Podcast

In this new episode of The Podcast, Kevin Chalhoub, founder of EV Lab and Head of Tumi, joins host Lynn Al-Khatib to explore the rise of electric vehicles, circular design, and how purpose-led innovation is reshaping the future of mobility.
From the family legacy and journey to the next-gen consumer’s expectations, this conversation dives deep into driving change, with values at the wheel.
Tune in through: 
Spotify <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1482&user=10620>  | Apple <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1483&user=10620>  | Anghami <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1484&user=10620>  | YouTube <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1485&user=10620>

<https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-7-min.png> 	

New Security Solutions Coming

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1487&user=10620> 	

We’re rolling out a new security solution to keep our data and your daily tools safe. It will control access to websites and cloud apps on Group devices, allowing only secure and business-relevant platforms.
To make sure you don’t lose access to the tools you rely on, tell us what you and your team use regularly by 18 July here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1487&user=10620>  . This is your chance to stay connected and protected. Got questions? Reach out to Info Sec Team <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1488&user=10620> .

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/05-3-min.png> 	

Saks Fifth Avenue – The Designer Sale | Bahrain


The designer sale has just got better at Saks.

Shop your favorite fashion brands up to 60% off, in-store at City Centre Bahrain. 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/a855629cdbb516be1d4b0431ba515ed2413402547.gif> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/06-1-min.png> 	

WEEKLY INTERNAL OPPORTUNITIES

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1489&user=10620> 	

Visit our Chalhoub Career Site <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1489&user=10620>  for all our vacancies and use your Chalhoub email address to be recognized as Internal!
